parameters.name: time_range
parameters.title: Relative Time Rage
parameters.description: The relative time range to use in all content pack widgets

description.@value: This dashboard provides an analysis of Cloudflare threat traffic including the total number of requests and threats stopped. More detailed metrics by country, city, IP, threat type, and user agent are also provided.

This dashboard provides an analysis to help identify and resolve performance-related problems. Detailed breakdowns by response time, caching status, content type, host name, request method, protocol, and request URIs are also provided.
This dashboard provides insights into application reliability with an overview of request successes and errors. More details breakdowns by HTTP status codes, and request URIs are also provided.

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of the most important Cloudflare log metrics including a breakdown of request and caching details. More detailed metrics by content type, IP, location, protocol, and request method are also provided.
This dashboard helps to detect and investigate bot traffic. Detailed breakdowns by bot type, country, request URIs and user agents are also provided.

source.@value:
pipeline "Cloudflare"
stage 0 match all
rule "ClientIP geoip lookup"
rule "cloudflare-threat"
rule "cloudflare-bot-detection"
rule "cloudflare-captcha"
end

rule "cloudflare-bot-detection"
when
  has_field("EdgePathingSrc")
then
 set_field("Bot", $message.EdgePathingSrc == "filterBasedFirewall" && $message.EdgePathingStatus == "captchaNew");
end
